a.n: Sunrise: a song of two humans

p.k: Romance Usa (1927). Hrají: George O'Brien, Janet Gaynor, Margaret Livingtson. Režie: F.W. Murnau.
p.d: An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.
